countries.name: Korea
countries.comment1: siteSpnObjId is the object id associated with the managed application for the site-specific service principal (msteams-webhook-xx-service-principal)
countries.comment2: cosmosaccountname is name abbrevation for creating cosmos databse account
countries.comment3: If isSingleRegion value is false, golocal has two regions and storage accounts will be RA-GRS, if value is true golocal has one region and storage accounts,cosmos are ZRS(Zone Redundant)
countries.comment4: notificationstorage is abbrevation of azure region specific storage account, it can be asia(asea,asse), europe(euno,euwe) or america specific
countries.comment5: priorityNotificationsdb is abbrevation of azure region specific cosmos db account, it can be APAC or  EU and priorityNotificationsgroup is resource group in which cosmos account resides

countries.name: SouthAfrica
countries.comment5: last is true for the last country section in the array, false for all the others.

countries.name: Singapore
countries.comment5: last is true for the last country section in the array, false for all the others.
countries.comment3: If isSingleRegion value is false, golocal has two regions and storage accounts will be RA-GRS, if value is true golocal has one region and storage accounts,cosmos are ZRS(Zone Redundant)

countries.name: UAE
countries.comment5: last is true for the last country section in the array, false for all the others.
countries.comment3: Region count is number of regions like sgse. For one region storage  and cosmos are ZRS(Zone Redundant), if two regions are present storage accounts will be RA-GRS.

countries.name: Switzerland
countries.comment5: last is true for the last country section in the array, false for all the others.
countries.comment3: Region count is number of regions like sgse. For one region storage  and cosmos are ZRS(Zone Redundant), if two regions are present storage accounts will be RA-GRS.

countries.comment3: Region count is number of regions like sgse. For one region storage  and cosmos are ZRS(Zone Redundant), if two regions are present storage accounts will be RA-GRS.

countries.comment3: Region count is number of regions like sgse. For one region storage  and cosmos are ZRS(Zone Redundant), if two regions are present storage accounts will be RA-GRS.

comment6: myobjId is object id of Dev who is running/updating the scripts
comment7: scriptSpnAppId is the application id associated with the common Service Principal created to run powershell scripts during the deployment
comment8: scriptSpnObjId is the object id associated with the managed application for the common Service Principal created to run powershell scripts during the deployment (EV2Test)
comment9: spnSecretLink is the link to the Key Vault Secret containing the password for the common script Service Principal.
comment10: existKeyVaultLink is the link to the existing key vault from which we need to obtain the secrets for the aria token, encryption token(we are currently using the 'msteams-golocal-common' vault in the infra subscription)
